title: Upwork: Build Custom Notion Workspace
description:
I'm looking for an experienced Notion system designer to help build a clean, professional, and scalable workspace for my digital media business. We produce YouTube content across multiple channels with teams of freelancers (scriptwriters, editors, voiceover, managers, etc.).

What I Need:
- A centralized Notion system that includes:
- Dashboards per role (Writer, Editor, Manager, etc.)
- SOP repository (well-organized and easy to access)
- Project templates for video production
- Team task boards and timelines
- Asset tracking (scripts, voice files, thumbnails)

Easy onboarding for new freelancers (sending contract, SOP, etc)

Integration knowledge with Trello, Discord and Zapier is a plus

Ideal Candidate:
Proven experience building advanced Notion setups (please provide examples or walkthroughs)

Strong sense of UX and visual organization

Creative problem solver who can recommend efficient systems

Bonus: Experience working with media, content production, or YouTube teams

The objective:
To have a turnkey system where everything is organized, branded, efficient, and scalable as we grow. I want to minimize chaos, centralize knowledge, and empower freelancers to work more independently.

Please explain what you have done for other companies and mention ''h1'' on top of your proposal if you're not an AI bot.

Thanks!
$250.00

          This range includes relevant proposals, but does not include proposals that are withdrawn, declined, or archived. Please note that all proposals are accessible to clients on their applicants page.
